results.content:
The instructor did a fantastic job in teaching this course! I look forward to using it again and again, as well as taking more of his courses.
Thank you so much!

The instructor did a fantastic job in teaching this course! I look forward to using it again and again, as well as taking more of his courses.

results.content: Show step by step how to do websites, Perhaps a portfolio. The videos seem to be incomplete. They start off with everything done. The delivery is to fast. As a beginner, you get lost fast. As part of the course, there is an offer for starter wordpress course that I could not access. And when I clicked the link, It opened to another course on udemy and wanted to charge me for it.  Did not meet my expectations.
